PROFESSIONAL SYNOPSIS 
Consummate Oracle Applications Functional Consultant with expertise in various business processes across financial 
applications.  Specialize in suggesting expert solutions to client requirements through holistic approach.  Committed to 
achieving long-term results for clients with global footprint with complex requirements.  
CORE QUALIFICATIONS
*	Implement core financial cycles including System Administration, General Ledger (GL), Procure to Pay (P2P), Order to 
Cash (O2C), Acquire to Retire (A2R), Subledger Accounting (SLA), EB-Tax
*	Worked with all phases of project life cycle including requirements gathering, GAP analysis, fit-gap analysis, system 
configuration and testing, conference room piloting, user acceptance testing, and post-production support
*	Experience with multiple implementations, upgrades, conversions, migrations, and post-production support roles 
*	Worked in Agile and Waterfall methodologies as well hybrid of both
*	SME for Approval Management Engine (AME) and Oracle Workflow 
*	Interact with Oracle support and hold Oracle Web Conference (OWC) through Oracle Service Request (SR)
*	Experience with Oracle AIM methodology documents including RD20, BP80, BR30, BR100, MD50, CV40, and TE40.  
*	Accountable for timely delivery working as a lead in an off-shore model
*	Created and maintained user manuals and held training sessions for large user groups
*	Excellent verbal communication and presentation skills
TECHNICICAL SKILLS
Applications
Oracle Versions 11i 11.5.8; R12.0.3 to 12.2.5; Fusion R13 Update 17D

Data Loader, Toad/SQL Developer, Web ADI, OBIEE, Hyperion, Discoverer, MS Project
